extDescription.message: LinkShield helps you identify dangerous websites. Never share sensitive information with unknown sites.

alertMessage.message: This website contains a link to:

severityMediumRisk.message: Medium risk: This link may be unsafe. Be careful.

adviceCheckUrl.message: Only open this link if you're sure it's safe. Carefully check the web address. Never log in if you're in doubt about the URL.

noHttps.message: This link doesn't use HTTPS (high risk). Your data can be stolen more easily.

ipAsDomain.message: This website uses an IP address instead of a **domain name** (high risk). This could be a trick to deceive you.

tooManySubdomains.message: This web address has many subdomains (high risk). The site might be fake.

suspiciousKeywords.message: Suspicious words found (medium risk). These are often used for scams.

suspiciousPattern.message: The web address looks suspicious (high risk). This can be used to scam you.

shortenedUrl.message: This is a shortened link (high risk). You can't see where it actually leads.

downloadPage.message: This page offers a suspicious download (high risk). It may contain malicious software.

freeHosting.message: This website uses free hosting (high risk). These sites often have less security.

encodedCharacters.message: This web address contains strange characters (high risk). This can be used to hide something dangerous.

homoglyphAttack.message: This address uses similar characters (medium risk). It may try to look like a real website.

metaRedirect.message: This website redirects you automatically (high risk). You might be sent to a dangerous site.

cryptoPhishing.message: This address looks like a crypto scam (high risk). Be careful not to lose money.

externalScripts.message: This site loads suspicious external code (high risk). This can be dangerous.

suspiciousIframes.message: This site contains suspicious embedded frames (high risk). These can be used to mislead you.

suspiciousParams.message: This address contains suspicious extra information (medium risk). It can be used to bypass security.

mixedContent.message: This page uses both secure and insecure elements (medium risk). It can weaken security.

unusualPort.message: This site uses an unusual port (high risk). It may try to bypass security.

javascriptScheme.message: This address uses JavaScript (high risk). It can execute malicious code.

urlFragmentTrick.message: This address contains a suspicious fragment (medium risk). It can mislead you about your true location.

suspiciousTLD.message: This domain uses a risky top-level domain (high risk). Some TLDs are often used for fraud.

base64OrHex.message: This address contains encoded information (medium risk). It may hide something dangerous.

iframeHidden.message: This site uses a hidden frame (medium risk). This can hide something from you.

similarToLegitimateDomain.message: This site looks very similar to a known, trustworthy site. It could be a fake copy.

popupSubtitle.message: Stay safe with alerts and protection.

backgroundAnalysisDescription.message: Block dangerous websites before you visit them.

activationRequired.message: Enable this feature before using it.

integratedProtectionDescription.message: This feature checks websites and links directly.

premiumFeaturesActive.message: You are now using the premium version!

upgradePrompt.message: Upgrade to premium to unlock additional features.

bulkUrlCheckDescription.message: Upload a .txt file to check many links at once.

allowedProtocol.message: This link uses a safe protocol.

insecureLoginPage.message: This login page doesn't use HTTPS (high risk). Your data could be stolen.

invalidUrl.message: This web address is invalid or mistyped.

loadingMessage.message: Please wait, the system is checking...

loginPageNoMX.message: A login page was found, but the domain has no mail server. This could be phishing.

sslValidationFailed.message: The security of this website is invalid. The certificate is missing or insecure.

malwareExtension.message: This file has a suspicious extension (high risk). It may contain malicious software.

shortenedUrlError.message: Something went wrong while checking this short link (low risk). We don't know where it leads.

redirectedShortenedUrl.message: This shortened link redirects to another website (medium risk).

cryptoPhishingAd.message: This ad looks like a crypto scam (high risk). Be extra careful.

suspiciousAdStructure.message: The link in this ad looks strange (medium risk). It may not be safe.

suspiciousAdTLD.message: This ad uses a top-level domain that is often abused (high risk).

homoglyphAdAttack.message: The ad uses characters that resemble a known website (medium risk).

brandMisuse.message: The ad improperly uses a known brand name (high risk). It may be fake.

typosquattingAttack.message: This web address is a **typosquatting attack**, meaning it looks like a real domain but is slightly altered to trick you into thinking it's legitimate (high risk).

downloadKeyword.message: We found a suspicious download-related keyword in the link (medium risk). It might **indicate a malicious download**.

suspiciousScriptContent.message: This script contains suspicious code, such as 'eval()' or 'document.write()'. It may be unsafe.

invalidScriptSrc.message: The script link is incorrect or unreadable.

suspiciousIframeKeyword.message: A suspicious word was found in the link of an embedded frame (iframe).

allowedQueryParam.message: The link contains a safe, allowed query parameter.

suspiciousPageText.message: This page contains suspicious text (high risk). It may trick you into doing something.

urgencyTactic.message: This page uses urgent language to pressure you (high risk). Watch out for scams.

mixedScripts.message: This address mixes different script systems (medium risk). It could be a phishing trick.
